com.digi.xbee.api

Class Raw802Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.AbstractXBeeDevice
      • com.digi.xbee.api.XBeeDevice
        • com.digi.xbee.api.Raw802Device

  • public class Raw802Device
extends XBeeDevice
    This class represents a local 802.15.4 device.
    See Also:
    XBeeDevice, DigiMeshDevice, DigiPointDevice, ZigBeeDevice

      • Raw802Device

        public Raw802Device(IConnectionInterface connectionInterface)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new Raw802Device object with the given connection interface.
        Parameters:
        connectionInterface - The connection interface with the physical 802.15.4 device.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if connectionInterface == null
        See Also:
        IConnectionInterface

      • Raw802Device

        public Raw802Device(String port,
            int baudRate)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new Raw802Device object in the given port name and baud rate.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name where 802.15.4 device is attached to.
        baudRate - Serial port baud rate to communicate with the device. Other connection parameters will be set as default (8 data bits, 1 stop bit, no parity, no flow control).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 0.
        NullPointerException - if port == null.

      • Raw802Device

        public Raw802Device(String port,
            int baudRate,
            int dataBits,
            int stopBits,
            int parity,
            int flowControl)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new Raw802Device object in the given serial port name and settings.
        Parameters:
        port - Serial port name where 802.15.4 device is attached to.
        baudRate - Serial port baud rate to communicate with the device.
        dataBits - Serial port data bits.
        stopBits - Serial port data bits.
        parity - Serial port data bits.
        flowControl - Serial port data bits.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if baudRate < 0 or if dataBits < 0 or if stopBits < 0 or if parity < 0 or if flowControl < 0.
        NullPointerException - if port == null.

        serialPortParameters - Object containing the serial port parameters.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if port == null or if serialPortParameters == null.

    • Method Detail

      • getAssociationIndicationStatus

        public AssociationIndicationStatus getAssociationIndicationStatus()
                                                           throws TimeoutException,
                                                                  XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the current association status of this XBee device.

        It indicates occurrences of errors during the last association request.

        Returns:
        The association indication status of the XBee device.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout getting the association indication status.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        AbstractXBeeDevice.forceDisassociate(), AssociationIndicationStatus

      • getXBeeProtocol

        public XBeeProtocol getXBeeProtocol()
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the XBee Protocol of this XBee device.

        To refresh this value use the AbstractXBeeDevice.readDeviceInfo() method.

        Overrides:
        getXBeeProtocol in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns:
        The XBee device protocol.
        See Also:
        XBeeProtocol

      • open

        public void open()
          throws XBeeException
        Description copied from class: XBeeDevice
        Opens the connection interface associated with this XBee device.

        When opening the device an information reading process is automatically performed. This includes:

        • 64-bit address.
        • Node Identifier.
        • Hardware version.
        • Firmware version.
        • XBee device protocol.
        • 16-bit address (not for DigiMesh modules).
        Overrides:
        open in class XBeeDevice
        Throws:
        XBeeException - if there is any problem opening this device connection.
        See Also:
        XBeeDevice.close(), XBeeDevice.isOpen()

      • sendData

        public void sendData(XBee16BitAddress address,
            byte[] data)
              throws TimeoutException,
                     XBeeException
        Sends the provided data to the XBee device of the network corresponding to the given 16-bit address.

        This method blocks until a success or error response arrives or the configured receive timeout expires.

        The received timeout is configured using the setReceiveTimeout method and can be consulted with getReceiveTimeout method.

        For non-blocking operations use the method sendData(XBee16BitAddress, byte[]).

        Parameters:
        address - The 16-bit address of the XBee that will receive the data.
        data - Byte array containing data to be sent.
        Throws:
        InterfaceNotOpenException - if the device is not open.
        NullPointerException - if address == null or if data == null.
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout sending the data.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress, XBeeDevice.getReceiveTimeout(), XBeeDevice.setReceiveTimeout(int), XBeeDevice.sendData(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), sendData(XBee64BitAddress, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), sendDataAsync(XBee16BitAddress, byte[]), sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress, byte[])

      • sendData

        public void sendData(XBee64BitAddress address,
            byte[] data)
              throws TimeoutException,
                     XBeeException
        Description copied from class: XBeeDevice
        Sends the provided data to the XBee device of the network corresponding to the given 64-bit address.

        This method blocks till a success or error response arrives or the configured receive timeout expires.

        The receive timeout is configured using the setReceiveTimeout method and can be consulted with getReceiveTimeout method.

        For non-blocking operations use the method XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress, byte[]).

        Parameters:
        address - The 64-bit address of the XBee that will receive the data.
        data - Byte array containing the data to be sent.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout sending the data.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        XBeeDevice.getReceiveTimeout(), XBeeDevice.setReceiveTimeout(int), XBeeDevice.sendData(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendData(XBee64BitAddress, XBee16BitAddress, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress, XBee16BitAddress, byte[]), XBee64BitAddress

      • sendDataAsync

        public void sendDataAsync(XBee16BitAddress address,
                 byte[] data)
                   throws XBeeException
        Sends the provided data to the XBee device of the network corresponding to the given 16-bit address asynchronously.

        Asynchronous transmissions do not wait for answer from the remote device or for transmit status packet

        Parameters:
        address - The 16-bit address of the XBee that will receive the data.
        data - Byte array containing data to be sent.
        Throws:
        InterfaceNotOpenException - if the device is not open.
        NullPointerException - if address == null or if data == null.
        XBeeException - if there is any XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress, XBeeDevice.sendData(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), sendData(XBee16BitAddress, byte[]), sendData(XBee64BitAddress, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress, byte[])

      • sendDataAsync

        public void sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress address,
                 byte[] data)
                   throws XBeeException
        Description copied from class: XBeeDevice
        Sends asynchronously the provided data to the XBee device of the network corresponding to the given 64-bit address.

        Asynchronous transmissions do not wait for answer from the remote device or for transmit status packet.

        Parameters:
        address - The 64-bit address of the XBee that will receive the data.
        data - Byte array containing the data to be sent.
        Throws:
        XBeeException - if there is any XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        XBeeDevice.sendData(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendData(XBee64BitAddress, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendData(XBee64BitAddress, XBee16BitAddress, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(RemoteXBeeDevice, byte[]), XBeeDevice.sendDataAsync(XBee64BitAddress, XBee16BitAddress, byte[]), XBee64BitAddress

                     throws TimeoutException,
                            XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Configures the 16-bit address (network address) of this XBee device with the provided one.

        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout setting the address.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
